item.title: About
item.author: liaocx@ihep.ac.cn (Chengxin Liao)
item.description:
About Me

Welcome to my personal website! I am Chengxin Liao, a researcher at IHEP.

Education

  • PhD in Physics, IHEP, 2020-2024
  • Master in Physics, IHEP, 2017-2020
  • Bachelor in Physics, University of Science and Technology of China, 2013-2017

Research Interests

  • High Energy Physics
  • Particle Physics
  • Experimental Physics

Contact

  • Email: liaocx@ihep.ac.cn
